page.title: 12Vandalism At ST.Michael's
page.content: Father John from St. Michaels was interviewed about a recent incident of vandalism in the church.He told us that the vandals had stolen a hand bell,the front door key,a religous book and possibly some food.All these items were retrieved after the crime except for the food. Fortunately the damage to the church was minimal.The vandals had trodden orange squash into the carpet on the centre aisle.They had also ridden a bicycle along the aisle which had done further damage to the carpet. There has only been one other incident of damage in the church.This was when a man came into the building with a shotgun.He fired the gun at a stained glass window causing it to shatter. After the most recent incident a party of cleaners came to help.
